Address.Address1: HOR AL ANZ EAST P O BOX 183532

Description.Text: This deluxe hotel apartment offers great facilities and location for both leisure and business travellers. A rooftop swimming pool, Jacuzzi, sauna and steam bath is available for guests to unwind, as is the property health club with fully equipped gymnasium. Conference and meeting facilities are available, as is hotel transfers however subject to conditions and availability. (TM06.08)

Standing in extensive grounds, Lotus Grand Hotel Apartment, Deira, is located in Hor Al Anz East, Deira, Dubai, 3 kilometers from Dubai International Airport and about 15 minute drive to World Trade Center, Dubai Creek, famous gold souqs, shopping mail and golf clubs around the city.

The luxurious and spacious 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments is an open plan design that consists of a fully-equipped kitchen with 06 range burner, microwave oven, refrigerator with freezer, toaster, tea and coffee kettle and necessary kitchen utensils. Lounge area with welcoming sofas enhances the enjoyment of the spacious living rooms with 34 inches flat-screened television, DVD players, music system and high-speed internet connectivity. Satellite TV is a standard feature in all apartments. Each bedroom within each apartment features private en-suite.
The newly built property is elegantly designed with many modern finishing.

The Lotus Grand offers a scrumptious array of regular multi-cuisine dishes on the diet-controlled menus that has been carefully planned and screened by a team of expert nutritionists, endocrinologist and chefs at BiteRite, the 24-hour coffee shop. Gastronomic delights await even the most critical palate. BiteRite Coffee shop seats 200 people where one can also enjoy an array of regular dishes on the menu for those who wish to have a choice of multi-cuisine dishes cooked the regular way. Internet facilities, a library and even a toddlers room for children to play in while guests dine are available in the Coffee shop. It should be noted that this property does not serve alcohol on it's premises.

The hotel is split into two wings however both can be accessed from the central lobby, this can be accessed upon arrival through the driveway that crosses through the building. The bright lobby is modern and comfortable.
